p: After evaluation of MNTD for both the compounds, the different non-cytotoxic concentrations of 5c and 5d compounds were screened on virus-infected Vero cells to find out the possible effects of the compounds. Viral-induced cytopathic effect (CPE) assay was evaluated at 48 hpi ( Supporting Information File 1). The compounds 5c and 5d exhibited a significant reduction of CHIKV-induced CPE at less than 70 Î¼M concentration.
